You don't sign up for a 'softcore pornography' channels as such channels do not objectively exist. All 'hardcore' does is add redundancy and make it sound like a Fox News report.
California's Supreme Court is located in San Francisco not Sacramento. This discrepancy was corrected.

Date maintenance tags and general fixes
Adding marriage template. No change to links or formatting. (assisted manual edit)
/* Trial */Editing my edit for writing style
Added wiki links + minor editorial changes.
Seems most unlikely that prisoner Scott Peterson is lecturing at the University at Maine
I changed "had never swam" to "had never swum". "Swam" is the past form of "swim" whereas "swum" is used with "has", "have" or "had".
Changing name format. The editor tried to bold Peterson's name, unaware that the format he used already bolded it.
BOT - reverted possible [[WP:VAND|vandalism]] to last established [[WP:EDIT|edit]]

corrected mischaracterization of Phil Mickelson quote
